'''Postern''' was the company that released the video game ''[[Shadowfax (video game)|Shadowfax]]''.<ref>{{webcite|author=Fredrik Ekman|articleurl=http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/shadowfax.html|articlename=Shadowfax|dated=|website=Games|accessed=14 august 2011}}</ref> [[Mike Singleton]]<ref>{{webcite|author=Roger Kean|articleurl=http://www.crashonline.org.uk/14/singletn.htm|articlename=I BET TOLKIEN DID THE SAME|dated=|website=[http://www.crashonline.org.uk/ Crash Online]|accessed=29 december 2014}}</ref> and Sean Logan worked for Postern.
